original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Meṇḍakapañha
analyzed: meṇḍakapañha

original: Santhavavagga
analyzed: santhava vagga

original: 6. Chaddantajotipālārabbhapañha
analyzed: chad danta joti pāla ārabbha pañha

original: “Bhante nāgasena, bhāsitampetaṁ bhagavatā chaddanto nāgarājā—
analyzed: bhante nāgasena bhāsitam petam bhagavatā chaddantaḥ nāga rājā

original: ‘Vadhissametanti parāmasanto,
analyzed: vadhiḥ sametanti parāmasantaḥ

original: Kāsāvamaddakkhi dhajaṁ isīnaṁ;
analyzed: dhajam isīna

original: Dukkhena phuṭṭhassudapādi saññā,
analyzed: dukkhena phuṭṭhassa udapādi saññā

original: Arahaddhajo sabbhi avajjharūpo’ti.
analyzed: arahat hajaḥ sabbhi avajjharūpaḥ iti

original: Puna ca bhaṇitaṁ—
analyzed: punar ca bhaṇita

original: ‘jotipālamāṇavo samāno kassapaṁ bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ muṇḍakavādena samaṇakavādena asabbhāhi pharusāhi vācāhi akkosi paribhāsī’ti.
analyzed: jotipāla māṇavaḥ samānaḥ kassapam bhagavantam arahantam sammāsambuddham muṇḍaka vādena samaṇaka vādena asabbhāhi pharusāhi vācāhi akkosi paribhāsi iti

original: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, bodhisatto tiracchānagato samāno kāsāvaṁ abhipūjayi, tena
analyzed: yadi bhante nāgasena bodhisatto tiracchāna gataḥ samānaḥ kāsāvam tena

original: hi ‘jotipālena māṇavena kassapo bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho muṇḍakavādena samaṇakavādena
analyzed: hi jotipālena māṇavena kassapaḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ muṇḍaka vādena samaṇaka vādena

original: asabbhāhi pharusāhi vācāhi akkuṭṭho paribhāsito’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
analyzed: asabbhāhi pharusāhi vācāhi akkuṭṭhaḥ paribhāsito iti yam tam micchā

original: Yadi jotipālena māṇavena kassapo bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho muṇḍakavādena samaṇakavādena
analyzed: yadi jotipālena māṇavena kassapaḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ muṇḍaka vādena samaṇaka vādena

original: asabbhāhi pharusāhi vācāhi akkuṭṭho paribhāsito, tena hi ‘chaddantena nāgarājena
analyzed: asabbhāhi pharusāhi vācāhi akkuṭṭhaḥ paribhāsito tena hi chaddantena nāga rājena

original: kāsāvaṁ pūjitan’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
analyzed: vacanam micchā

original: Yadi tiracchānagatena bodhisattena kakkhaḷakharakaṭukavedanaṁ vedayamānena luddakena
analyzed: yadi tiracchāna gatena bodhisattena kakkhaḷa khara kaṭuka vedanam vedayamānena luddakena

original: nivatthaṁ kāsāvaṁ pūjitaṁ, kiṁ manussabhūto samāno paripakkañāṇo paripakkāya bodhiyā
analyzed: nivattham kāsāvam pūjita kim manussa bhūtaḥ samānaḥ paripakka ñāṇo paripakkāya bodhiyā

original: kassapaṁ bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ dasabalaṁ lokanāyakaṁ uditoditaṁ jalitabyāmobhāsaṁ
analyzed: kassapam bhagavantam arahantam sammāsambuddham dasabalam lokanāyakam uditoditam jalita byāma ubhāsa

original: pavaruttamaṁ pavararucirakāsikakāsāvamabhipārutaṁ disvā na pūjayi?
analyzed: pavara uttamam pavara rucira kāsika kāsāvam abhipārutam disvā na pūjayi

original: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabboti.
analyzed: ayam pi ubhatas koṭikaḥ pañho tava anuppatto saḥ tayā nibbāhitabbaḥ ti

original: Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā chaddanto nāgarājā ‘vadhissametanti …pe…
analyzed: mahā rāja bhagavatā chaddantaḥ nāga rājā pe

original: avajjharūpo’ti.
analyzed: avajjharūpā iti

original: Jotipālena ca māṇavena kassapo bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho muṇḍakavādena samaṇakavādena asabbhāhi pharusāhi vācāhi akkuṭṭho paribhāsito, tañca pana jātivasena kulavasena.
analyzed: jotipālena ca māṇavena kassapaḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ muṇḍaka vādena samaṇaka vādena asabbhāhi pharusāhi vācāhi akkuṭṭhaḥ paribhāsitaḥ tat ca pana jāti vasena kula vasena

original: Jotipālo, mahārāja, māṇavo assaddhe appasanne kule paccājāto, tassa mātāpitaro bhaginibhātaro
analyzed: jotipālaḥ mahā rāja māṇavaḥ assaddhe appasanne kule paccājātaḥ tassa mātā pitaraḥ bhagini bhātaro

original: dāsidāsaceṭakaparivārakamanussā brahmadevatā brahmagarukā, te ‘brāhmaṇā eva uttamā
analyzed: dāsi dāsa ceṭaka parivāraka manussāḥ brahmadevatāḥ brahmagarukā te brāhmaṇāḥ eva uttamā

original: pavarā’ti avasese pabbajite garahanti jigucchanti, tesaṁ taṁ vacanaṁ sutvā jotipālo
analyzed: avasese pabbajite garahanti jigucchanti tesam tam vacanam sutvā jotipālo

original: māṇavo ghaṭikārena kumbhakārena satthāraṁ dassanāya pakkosito evamāha—
analyzed: māṇavaḥ ghaṭikārena kumbhakārena satthāram dassanāya pakkositaḥ evam āha

original: ‘kiṁ pana tena muṇḍakena samaṇakena diṭṭhenā’ti.
analyzed: kim pana tena muṇḍakena samaṇakena diṭṭhena ati

original: Yathā, mahārāja, amataṁ visamāsajja tittakaṁ hoti, yathā ca sītodakaṁ aggimāsajja uṇhaṁ hoti;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja amatam visamāsajja tittakam hoti yathā ca sītā udakam aggim āsajja uṇham hoti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, jotipālo māṇavo assaddhe appasanne kule paccājāto, so kulavasena andho hutvā tathāgataṁ akkosi paribhāsi.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja jotipālaḥ māṇavaḥ assaddhe appasanne kule paccājātaḥ saḥ kula vasena andhaḥ hutvā tathāgatam akkosi paribhāsi

original: Yathā, mahārāja, jalitapajjalito mahāaggikkhandho sappabhāso udakamāsajja upahatappabhātejo sītalo kāḷako bhavati paripakkanigguṇḍiphalasadiso;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja jalita pajjalitaḥ mahā aggi kkhandhaḥ sappabhāsaḥ udakam āsajje upahata ppabhā tejaḥ sītalaḥ kāḷakaḥ bhavati paripakka nigguṇḍi phala sadisaḥ

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, jotipālo māṇavo puññavā saddho ñāṇavipulasappabhāso assaddhe
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja jotipālaḥ māṇavaḥ puññavā saddhaḥ ñāṇa vipula sa pabhāsaḥ assaddhe

original: appasanne kule paccājāto, so kulavasena andho hutvā tathāgataṁ akkosi paribhāsi,
analyzed: appasanne kule paccājāto saḥ kula vasena andhaḥ hutvā tathāgatam akkosi paribhāsi

original: upagantvā ca buddhaguṇamaññāya ceṭakabhūto viya ahosi, jinasāsane pabbajitvā abhiññā
analyzed: upagantvā ca buddha guṇam aññāya ceṭaka bhūtaḥ viya ahosi jina sāsane pabbajitvā abhiññā

original: ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā brahmalokūpago ahosī”ti.
analyzed: ca samāpattiyaḥ ca nibbattetvā brahma loka upagaḥ ahosi iti

original: “Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, evametaṁ tathā sampaṭicchāmī”ti.
analyzed: sādhu bhante nāgasena evam etam tathā sampaṭicchāmi iti

original: Chaddantajotipālārabbhapañho chaṭṭho.
analyzed: chaddanta jotipāla ārabbhapañhaḥ chaṭṭho
